law.text: Each member of the commission shall receive as compensation fifteen thousand dollars ($15,000) per annum and actual and necessary expenses incurred in the performance of duties pertaining to the office.
law.history: Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 448, sec. 23, effective July 14, 1992. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 304, sec. 6, effective July 15, 1988. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 345, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1986. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 196, sec. 28, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 172, sec. 9, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 264, sec. 4. -- Amended 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 215, sec. 4, effective June 16, 1960. -- Created 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 184, sec. 2.
